#summary PayPal Payment Methods.

<table border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5">
  <thead align="center">
    <tr>
      <th colspan="2"></th>
      <th>Order created</th>
      <th>Payment successful</th>
      <th>Payment Canceled</th>
      <th>After shipment</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody align="center">
    <tr>
      <td rowspan="2">*Express Checkout*</td>
      <td>_Simple_</td>
      <td colspan="2">Processing | To Save</td>
      <td>No order | ---</td>
      <td>Complete | To Delete</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>_Virtual_</td>
      <td colspan="2">Complete | To Delete</td>
      <td>No order | ---</td>
      <td>--- | ---</td>
    </tr>

    <tr>
      <td rowspan="2">*Standard Checkout*</td>
      <td>_Simple_</td>
      <td>Pending Payment | ---</td>
      <td>Processing  | To Save</td>
      <td>Cancelled | To Delete</td>
      <td>Complete | To Delete</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>_Virtual_</td>
      <td>Pending Payment | ---</td>
      <td>Complete  | To Delete</td>
      <td>Cancelled | To Delete</td>
      <td>--- | ---</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
<table>
